Cam::

She stepped back and transformed into bod mode. She looked like a 7 
year old girl with long red hair. She stared at Blackfang. "But, I 
thought we could all be friends or something." She looked down. Her 
face looked as if she would cry soon. She kicked the ground and 
figgited with her hands. "why can't we keep her? We're maximals, so 
what if she's different. We can make her a friend can't we?" She put 
her little arms around Blackfang's neck and hugged tight, crying as 
she hugged him. "She looks like mommy."






-- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang didn't even bother to reply to Sharpclaw's answer. He 
turned
> to Cam and took her by the shoulders.
> 
> Blackfang: Listen Cam, I'd like it a lot if we could keep her, but 
her
> place is not with us. We're Maximals and she's a Predacon. You saw 
her
> friend outside, didn't you? That's why she can't stay. She's got
> friends of her own and she's supposed to be our enemy. You get that,
> don't you?
> 
>
